physicalDescription.note: On envelope: "#498 Leadville Businesses 1900-1915." On back of photograph: "Miners at Penrose Mine, c1915-1918., Back Row: unidentified, Bert Hawkins, Claude Simmons, Charles Hawkins, Charles Cose, Charles Peterson (blacksmith), unidentified., Front Row: Maurice Miller (supplied gear to the miners), Billy Angees, unidentified, Connie McGrehan, Charles Withey, Ben Gray, Sam Simmons (fireman), unidentified, Big Smith (master mechanic)., Sam Looney could be one of the missing, #498." On original envelope, "Leadville Businesses 1900-1915."

mods.abstract: Group of miners outside the Penrose Mine. Back Row: unidentified, Bert Hawkins, Claude Simmons, Charles Hawkins, Charles Cose, Charles Peterson (blacksmith), unidentified., Front Row: Maurice Miller (supplied gear to the miners), Billy Angees, unidentified, Connie McGrehan, Charles Withey, Ben Gray, Sam Simmons (fireman), unidentified, Big Smith (master mechanic)., Sam Looney could be one of the missing.
mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
